vote.title: Authorize (1) ratification of the City Manager’s purchase and payment in the amount of $225,000.00 incurred for emergency debris monitoring services related to the severe weather event occurring on May 28, 2024; and (2) a one-year emergency service price agreement with Tetra Tech, Inc. for emergency debris monitoring services in the estimated amount of $525,000.00, for a total estimated contract amount of $750,000.00 - Tetra Tech, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of seven - Total estimated amount of $750,000.00 - Financing: Sanitation Operation Fund
vote.description: Authorize (1) ratification of the City Manager’s purchase and payment in the amount of $225,000.00 incurred for emergency debris monitoring services related to the severe weather event occurring on May 28, 2024; and (2) a one-year emergency service price agreement with Tetra Tech, Inc. for emergency debris monitoring services in the estimated amount of $525,000.00, for a total estimated contract amount of $750,000.00 - Tetra Tech, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of seven - Total estimated amount of $750,000.00 - Financing: Sanitation Operation Fund
